div.p:
Curia Capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in
pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini
Millesimo iiijmo nonagesimo quinto

The saide day the Aldirman ande balyeis eftir the tenour of
the deliuerance of ane assis' Johnhe colisone forspekar assignit
friday next tocum to patrik chernside to tak the bile gevin
In be Dauid mar yongar anent the clame of fyve pundis
and iij s' apone his wif eftir the tenour of the borgh' strekit
be the saide Dauide ande awis' tharwith to the saide day
ande thar to depone be his aithe quhat Somez is
awinge of the saide bill to the saide Dauid

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid hill procurator aliso
ne liell protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
sex s' et octo d' de quadam terram vasta Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico superiori ecclesie inter terram quondam thome Waus
ex orientali ex vna et terram henricj tulidef ex occidentali
partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit
in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Johanne
Ramsay hatmakar Johanne fechat Juniore et henrico
orvm sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus patricius
ramsay et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
redditu solidorum sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis culan ex australj et
terram Johannis colisone' ex borialj Ad quam terram acce
dens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne ramsay Johanne fechat Juniore et henrico orum sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Andreas henricj capellanus
et procurator altaris beati nicholaij de Abirdene et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu trium solidorum
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis culan ex australi et
terram Johannis colisone ex borealj Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo
presentavit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus Johanne
Andrea Watsone thoma tod et Andrea nachtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Walterus
staw capellanus perpetuus de morbhy et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu tresdecim solidorum sibi
annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum
in le futy inter terram Willelmi litstar ex australi et terram
Johannis reid carnificis ex boreali cum camera extenden' ad le
linkis Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne bawquhelly alias
low skinnar vocato Johanne colly et henrico orvm sergeando

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per patricium leslie thomam Waus deductis nomine
procuratorio domini de bernis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam
terre vaste Jacentis in futy inter terram Andree murray Judicatoris ex australi
ex vna et terram quondam thome brosour ex boreali partibus ab altera
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus quinque s' a longo tempore
debit' et non solut' vnde dictus procurator nomine procuratorio quo supra peciit
a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justicie comple
mentum Tunc Curia mature auisiata quod dictus dominus de barnis
proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
dicti annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judi
dicatoris Curie datum fuit pro Judicio Teste Curia

The said day Alexander gray lauchfullie callit and nocht compe
rit to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be Androw
monrow that he wrangis anent the hamebringin of ane dispen
sacion quhilk he promittit to bring hame to him eftir the tenor
of the borghe strekit one him as ferd day of process' be androw
nachtj sergeand tharfor sere Johne ruthirfurd' forspekar for the said Androw
fand ane borghe in the hand of the said sergeand' that he hed
Cumin to his clame anent the said dispensacion' eftir the tenor'
of ane writ producit In Jugement be the said androw and aski
Sudanlie thareftir the said knicht forspekar to the said Androw
fand ane borghe in the handis of the said sergeand' that his borghe
is of vaile In defalt of Recontouris and askit warde
and dome tharapone Ande thareftir the court riplie auisit the
proces' lede herapone red herd and vndirstandin wardit and
schew for law that the said borghe strekit be the said knicht
forspekar to the saide androw is of vaile be ane writ schevin
In Jugement writin and subscriuit with the said Alexandris hande and
that the saide Alexander aw to bring hame the said dispensacion eftir the
tenor of the said' writ and gevin for dome be the moutht
of the said' Jonhne Williamsone dempstar of the saide
court

The saide day Androw monrow Solempnitlie protestit for his
Costis Skathtis and expensis maid and Sustenit in the
said action betuix him and Alexander gray

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die Janu
arij quo supra

The saide day Dauid menyeis offerit him redy to vndirlie
the decisione and ordinance of ane Suorne assis' in al actionis
that Johne Sanclar and Richard Wricht hed to him anent the pament of
the annuell of the land diuidit and Josit ymang thame

The saide day William Wricht protestit to be quyt of the challance
of Richard Wricht quhil he be follouit be new Soyt becaus'
he was redy to ansuer' him and comperit nocht to follow him

add.foreign: vxor patricij chernsid' et D mar'

div.p:
The said day the wif of patrik chernsid' was quyt of the
fyve li' and iij s' clamit one hir be ane borghe' strekit be David
mar' yongar hir gude Sone except' iiij s' and the said borghe
of nayne avale and scho quyt of his challance be the aith
of hir' said Spous' eftir the tenour of the deliuerance of ane assis'
gane obefor

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxiij die Januarij quo supra

The saide day the borgh' strekit be patrik chernside one
Dauid mare for the wrangwys' cutting of and withhaldin
of the pendes' of ane siluer belt is of nayne awaile be
ane suorne assis' William blinsele forspekar ande the saide
Dauid quyt of his chalange Ande atour the saide assis'
ordanit the saide Dauid to restor' ane siluer belt to the saide patrik
quhilk the saide Dauid wyf borouit fra the spous' of the saide
patrik be the moutht of the saide William blinsel s forspekar

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvjo die mensis Januarij quo supra

the saide day Alexander Rede forspekar for margaret Scherar'
grantit that he suld nocht follow forthir in the breywe of Inquest
purchest be the saide margaret as ayr to vmquhile Williame
Scherar' hir' brothir nay scho is nerrast and lauchfull ayr to hir'
brothir of lauchfule age and he deit laste westit and Sesit
at fatht and pece of our Souerane lorde the kinge

div.head:
Assisa ad Inquisicionem
margarete Scherar'
div.p:
Johannes Wormet Andreas Cullane Junior Andreas murray senior Alexander
gray Johannes retre Willelmus Wormet Willelmus portar Alexander
liell Johannes Waus thomas Waus Willelmus buchan Andreas
litstar Johannes thomsone patricius chernsid' Walterus gareache
Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus Scherar' frater margarete Scherar' latricis presencium
obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis Et quod dicta marga
reta est legittima et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam fratris suj Et
quod est legittime etatis margareta scherar' est legittima et propinquior
heres quondam Willelmi scherar' fratris et quod est legittime etatis Et quod
ipse decessit et obiit ad fidem et pacem domini nostri Regis

the saide day Alexander menyeis and mastir Walter leslie parsone
of mennivir' forspekaris for mariorie scherar Isabell scherar'
and marione Scherar' excepit agane Jonhne Colisone alle
geand' that he awcht nocht to pas' apone the seruing of the breyve
of Inquest purchest be margaret Scherar' becaus' he hed gevin
partiall consall and perofferit that in his Ande the said Johne deponit
be his aithe he hed gevin his Counsal in the said' action'
to the said margaretis expedicion and stude with hir' at the bar' in
furthiring of the samyn matir

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
Colisone forspekar that Jonhne low hed falyeit in his preyve
anent the pament of aucht li' and xv s' quhilkis was assignit him
to preywe pait for Dauid mar in his defalt And the borghe
strekit be the saide Dauid one the saide Johne for the wranguis'
haldin of ane assedacion' fra him of his Croftis was fundin of
vaile for the quhilkis the said Dauid Johne was in ane Amerciament of the court
and aw to deliuer the said assedacion to the said Dauid and to amend
as law will et cetera and that gevin for dome of the quhilkis the said David
askit Instrument befor thir witnes Alexander chamer aldirman thomas fyff
Alexander chamer yongar Androw Cullane thomas leslie balyeis Alexander gray
mastir Alexander gordone James Colisone and philp Dunbrek sergeand

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo nono
die mensis Januarij quo supra

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit philp Dunbrek sergeand
to pas' and tak ane distres' for viij s' fra Androw cristesone becaus'
he was borghe' to entir Williame fingask this day to
ansuer' at the Instance of the aldirman and entirit him nocht tharfor
the aldirman and balyeis chargit the said Androw to entir the saide
Williame one monunday next to Cum befor tham to ansuer'
at the Instance of the aldirman

Eodem die gavinus murray amerciatur pro perturbio Willelmj gray per assi
sam Juratam ex ore Willelmi blinsel prelocutoris cuj emenda
bit ut Jura volunt pro qua satisfactione dictus gavinus soluet
ij li' cere ad lumen Sancti Sanguinis Et si in postrum aliquem
fratrem gilde perturbauerit reddet xl s' ad fabricam ecclesie

Eodem die actio debatibile inter Andream branche et Andream
Cullane penes Certum vinum continuatur usque in diem lune
proximo futuro sub Spe curie

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem primo die
februarij Anno Dominj et cetera nonagesimo quinto

head.add: the grant of the kingis lettres

div.p:
the saide day the mast part of Counsal and communite present for the
tyme grantit to putt the kingis lettres to dew execucion anent
burges to landwart forstallaris nichtwakaris pikaris rebellouris
brekaris of commone ordinance and craftis mene vsing merchandice

Eodem die Johannes blabir fecit constituit creauit and nominauit
Johannem mar suum legittimum procuratorem ad prosequendum Robertum evinsone et
Andream cristesone pro certo Sale Ac in omnibus aliis suis actionibus et causis
ipsum concernentibus agend' defendend' et cetera promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera in vbe
riore forma procuratorij

head.add: the mastir of Sanct nicholes werk

div.p:
the saide day Alexander Rede tuk vpone him to be mastir
of Sanct nicholes werk for ane yer' bot he wald nocht
vndirlie compt' bot be his avne conscience becaus' he
Coud' nocht writ

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhe
retre forspekar that thomas mar' sal deliuer to thome menyeis
his demi nethis gif it cane be gottin falyeing tharof als' gude ane
demi nethis be suorne prisaris and iij s' for his Cobill hir

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die
februarij quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xv dais to
Robert evinsone to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be John
of mar procurator to Jonhne blabir' for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of tua petj quartaris of Salt

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto
die februarij quo supra

Eodem die andreas Waus amerciatur pro perturbio ade ruthirfurde et Idem Adam
amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Andree et emendabunt Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas Waus inuenit Jacobum colisone plegium legalem
quod adam ruthirfurd' erit Indempnis pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Idem adam inuenit dominum Johannem ruthirfurd' plegium legalem quod dictus
Andreas erit Indempnis pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

the ix day of februar' the yer' of jM iiijc nyntj and fiwe yeris
thomas chamer tailyour' oblist him be the fatht of his bodie
to content and pay ane barrell of Salmond full red and Suet
gude ande Sufficient merchande gude of the richtuys' bind of this
burghe' at the fest of Sanct Johne the baptist next hereftir
or within xv dais next thareftir

the saide day It was accordit betuix Symon gardin and Donald'
bandone that gif the saide Symon cumis him Self and Inhabitis
the hous' that he has in tak of the saide Symon the saide
Donald is content and gif the saide Symon cumis nocht him self
and Inhabitis nocht the said hous the said Donald' sal bruk
it and nocht flytt payand' his maile as obefor'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die
mensis februarij quo Supra

The said day comperit Alexander gray burges of the said burghe'
ande said sere balyeis of this burghe' It is cumin to my knalage
that thar' was gevin in ane pretendit court of youris haldin in the
tolbutht of the said burghe the xj day of Januar' the yer of god et cetera
nyntj and fiwe yeris last bipassit ane pretendit dome agannis
me for ane Callit androw monrow be the moutht of Jonhne
Williamsone pretendit dempstar of the said pretendit court tueching
the bringinhame of ane dispensacion pertening to the said Androw monro
eftir the tenour of ane writ maid be me the said Alexander to the said
Androw as he allegis as at mair lintht is contenit in the pretendit
borghe' and process' deducit tharapone the quhilk dome thus gevin
contra me is evile and fals in It Self becaus' it was gevin at the
Instance of the said Androw monro contra the law I nocht beand
warnit lauchfulie nor procest be the according to the ordour of law
say that I coud nocht provid for remede of law to the pretendit
ferde day of the pretendit dome and process' protestand for may
resonnis to gif in for my defence in the said matir quhen and
quhar It efferis Ande herapone henry Orvm sergeand of this
court I fynd ane borghe' in your hande the quhilk I pretend
to follow witht al diligence within the terme of law And to the
follouing and perseving of the falsing of the saide dome the said Alexander
oblist and' band him be his landis and gudis his hand vphaldin
In the best ande Seuerast forme according to our' Souerane
lordis lawis befor the Jugez quhome It efferis day and place
according tharto And askit Instrument of me sere Johne stirueling clerk
and notar of the Court herapone befor thir witnes Jonhne Colisone thomas
prat Duncan Colisone Williame Wormet sere Androw Colisone henry
Orvm sergeand and Jonhne Williamson dempstar of this court

Eodem die Andreas litstar amerciatur per assisam ex ore Johannis colison'
prelocutoris assise pro perturbio medy Schevin et eadem amerciatur pro perturbio
dicti andree and quilibet emendabit ut Jura volunt pro qua emenda
dictus Andreas Soluet Johanni Sanclar' pro sanacione dicte mulieris lese
et ij li' Cere ad lumen sancti Sanguinis Infra Idem Andreas fatetur
tria quarteria lane dicte mulierj pro suo feodo

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
Colisone forspekar that gif Androw Cullane yongar will depone that
he pait demi merk at martimes to sere androw henrisone quen he lest
the lard of barnis croftis thane the said James Crak sal pay demi
mark to the said Androw for the annuell of the martimes terme bigan
